definition: finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end

sentences.english: The necessary legal training should be given to all officers and men.
sentences.chinese: 对全军指战员都要进行必要的法制教育。

sentences.english: The commander asked all officers to abandon the idea of liberalism.
sentences.chinese: 司令员要求各级指战员不能有自由主义思想。

sentences.english: Our fighters and commanders covered 120 li in a single night.
sentences.chinese: 我们的指战员一夜走了120里路。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the influence of military training in sea on cardiovascular function in officers and men.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨海训对参训指战员心血管系统功能的影响。

definition: Eighth Route Army, the larger of the two major Chinese communist forces fighting the Japanese in the Second Sino-Japanese War (1937-1945)
New Fourth army of Republic of China, set up in 1937 and controlled by the communists
the Chinese People's Volunteer Army deployed by China to aid North Korea in 1950
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 ren2 min2 zhi4 yuan4 jun1

definition: Peng Dehuai (1898-1974), top communist general, subsequently politician and politburo member, disgraced after attacking Mao's failed policies in 1959, and died after extensive persecution during the Cultural Revolution
